name: Skeletyl (36 keys, Colemak DHm)
author: Leonardo (FiNeX) Finetti (https://www.leonardofinetti.it)
notes:
# Skeletyl Keyboard Layout #
Revision date: 2024-07-14
Layout: English (US, intl, with dead keys)


## Keys Legend: ##
The following scheme describe the meaning of the keys symbols positions.

|-------------+------------+---------------|
| Shifted key | Symbols    | Shifted AltGr |
|-------------+------------+---------------|
| Functions   | Mouse      | Numbers       |
|-------------+------------+---------------|
| Single Tap  | Navigation | AltGr         |
|-------------+------------+---------------|
| Modifier    |            | Adjust        |
|-------------+------------+---------------|


## Color Legend: ##
- Green: Symbols
- Yellow: Navigation
- Cyan: Numbers
- Orange: Functions
- Pink: Mouse
